meanings.sent1: The blacksmith acierates the metal to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: Over time, exposure to extreme temperatures can acierate the surface of rocks.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally acierated the pasta, turning it into a crunchy mess.
meanings.sent4: Her determination acierates her resolve to overcome any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The intense workout acierates his muscles, making them more resilient.
